00050   const char *usage[] = {
00051     "usage: dumplog [options] <log-dir>",
00052     "",
00053     "  options:",
00054     "    --config=<file>  Read configuration from <file>.  The default config file",
00055     "                     is \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel",
00056     "                     install directory",
00057     "    --help           Display this help text and exit",
00058     "    --verbose,-v     Display 'true' if up, 'false' otherwise",
00059     "",
00060     "  This program dumps the given log's metadata.",
00061     "",

00073 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00074   string configFile = "";
00075   string log_dir;
00076   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00077   bool verbose = false;
00078   CommPtr comm_ptr;
00079   ConnectionManagerPtr conn_manager_ptr;
00080   DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client;
00081   CommitLogReader *log_reader;
00082 
00083   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00084   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00085 
00086   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00087     if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00088       configFile = &argv[i][9];
00089     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00090       verbose = true;
00091     else if (log_dir == "")
00092       log_dir = argv[i];
00093     else
00094       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00095   }
00096 
00097   if (log_dir == "")
00098       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00099   
00100   if (configFile == "")
00101     configFile = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00102 
00103   props_ptr = new Properties(configFile);
00104 
00105   comm_ptr = new Comm();
00106   conn_manager_ptr = new ConnectionManager(comm_ptr.get());
00107 
00111   {
00112     const char *logHost = props_ptr->get("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Host", 0);
00113     uint16_t logPort    = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Port", 0);
00114     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00115     if (logHost != 0) {
00116       InetAddr::initialize(&addr, logHost, logPort);
00117       dfs_client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_manager_ptr, addr, 600);
00118     }
00119     else {
00120       dfs_client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_manager_ptr, props_ptr);
00121     }
00122 
00123     if (!dfs_client->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00124       HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to DFS Broker, exiting...");
00125       exit(1);
00126     }
00127   }
00128 
00129   log_reader = new CommitLogReader(dfs_client, log_dir);
00130 
00131   printf("LOG %s\n", log_dir.c_str());
00132   display_log(dfs_client, "", log_reader);
00133 
00134   delete log_reader;
00135 
00136   return 0;
00137 }

00139 namespace {
00140 
00141   void display_log(DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client, String prefix, CommitLogReader *log_reader) {
00142     CommitLogBlockInfo binfo;
00143     BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00144 
00145     while (log_reader->next_raw_block(&binfo, &header)) {
00146 
00147       if (header.check_magic(CommitLog::MAGIC_DATA)) {
00148         printf("%sDATA frag=\"%s\" start=%09llu end=%09llu ", 
00149                prefix.c_str(), binfo.file_fragment, 
00150                (long long unsigned int)binfo.start_offset,
00151                (long long unsigned int)binfo.end_offset);
00152 
00153         if (binfo.error == Error::OK) {
00154           printf("ztype=\"%s\" zlen=%u len=%u\n",
00155                  BlockCompressionCodec::get_compressor_name(header.get_compression_type()),
00156                  header.get_data_zlength(), header.get_data_length());
00157         }
00158         else
00159           printf("%serror = \"%s\"\n", prefix.c_str(), Error::get_text(binfo.error));
00160       }
00161       else if (header.check_magic(CommitLog::MAGIC_LINK)) {
00162         const char *log_dir = (const char *)binfo.block_ptr + header.length();
00163         printf("%sLINK -> %s\n", prefix.c_str(), log_dir);
00164         CommitLogReader *tmp_reader = new CommitLogReader(dfs_client, log_dir);
00165         display_log(dfs_client, prefix+"  ", tmp_reader);
00166         delete tmp_reader;
00167       }
00168       else {
00169         printf("Invalid block header!!!\n");
00170       }
00171     }
00172   }
00173 
00174 }
